Package think.rpgitems.power

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Power
    Base interface for all powers
    PowerHit
    Triggers when hit some LivingEntity
    PowerHitTaken
    Triggers when being hit
    PowerHurt
    Triggers when being hurt
    PowerLeftClick
    Triggers when left click
    PowerOffhandClick
    Triggers when player clicks an item in offhand
    PowerProjectileHit
    Triggers when RPG Projectile hits
    PowerRightClick
    Triggers when right click
    PowerSneak
    Triggers when player sneaks
    PowerSprint
    Triggers when player sprints
    PowerSwapToMainhand
    Triggers when player swap offhand item to main hand
    PowerSwapToOffhand
    Triggers when player swap offhand item to main hand
    PowerTick
    Triggers per tick
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PowerManager
    Power Manager for registering and inspecting powers.
    PowerResult<T>  
    PowerTicker
    BukkitRunnable that runs RPGItem.tick(Player, ItemStack)
    RgiPowersPostFireEvent  
    RgiPowersPreFireEvent  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TriggerResult  
    TriggerType
